QuestData.Title: Ellia Ravenmane
QuestData.Description: We regularly organize one-on-one duels with trainees that we think are well-suited for one another. We have found one such trainee for you, $n.$b$bHer name is Ellia Ravenmane. This will be her first duel, too. She will be waiting for you at the pavilion just to the south of here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Defeat Ellia Ravenmane at the Angkhal Pavilion.
